description: Manual annotations - 300 gold standard jobs - Pre-ESCO (skill_text) - Exp1 (mcs=5)
sql_query: SELECT skill_text, COUNT(*) as frequency, COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) as job_count FROM gold_standard_annotations GROUP BY skill_text ORDER BY frequency DESC
temporal_sql_query: SELECT gsa.skill_text, DATE_TRUNC('quarter', rj.posted_date) as quarter, COUNT(*) as frequency FROM gold_standard_annotations gsa JOIN raw_jobs rj ON gsa.job_id = rj.job_id GROUP BY gsa.skill_text, quarter
